error.message: Instantiation of deprecated class Twig_Loader_Array: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\Loader\ArrayLoader" instead
Instantiation of deprecated class Twig_Environment: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\Environment" instead
The 'light' library is depending on a deprecated library. The core/underscore asset library is deprecated in Drupal 9.4.0 and will be removed in Drupal 10.0.0.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
